original_text: And ye have numbered the houses of Jerusalem, and the houses have ye broken down to fortify the wall.
korean_text: 또 예루살렘의 가옥을 계수하며 그 가옥을 헐어 성벽을 견고하게도 하며

sentences.original_text: And ye have numbered the houses of Jerusalem
and ye have broken down houses to fortify the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 성벽을 굳건하게 하기 위해 집들을 허물었습니다
